units

Class Doctor

  • java.lang.Object
    • units.Unit
      • units.Doctor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Doctor
extends Unit
    The Doctor is a controllable Unit for the player. Has a medium movement, can't do much damage but has more health, and has two medkits to heal itself or others. Created upon start of a new game, controlled by the human player.
    See Also:
